poem:
### Wider Horizons

Oak shadows stretch,   
breeze whispers  
through tall grass,  
where youth gather,  
alive in their eccentric  
vigor.   
The earth  
awakens beneath  
their feet;  
songs and laughter,  
ceremony in the air—  
the sun bows  
to their creative glow,  
dancing beyond  
the horizon's  
edge.
